project.title: ConnectX
project.summary:
**Project Overview:**
ConnectX is a sophisticated real-time chat application built with Next.js that enables secure, instant communication between users. The platform combines modern messaging capabilities with a unique digital library feature, allowing users to share and manage images while maintaining a seamless chat experience.

**Key Features:**
* Real-time messaging with typing indicators and online status tracking
* Secure image sharing with drag-and-drop functionality and status tracking
* Digital library system for organized image management and targeted sharing
* JWT-based authentication with secure user management
* Responsive design optimized for both desktop and mobile platforms

**Technologies Used:**
Next.js, React, Socket.io, PostgreSQL, Prisma ORM, Docker, JWT Authentication, Node.js

**Impact & Benefits:**
ConnectX streamlines digital communication by combining instant messaging with organized file sharing capabilities. Its architecture ensures scalability and security while providing an intuitive user experience that enhances productivity in both personal and professional contexts.

This portfolio summary captures the essential aspects of ConnectX, highlighting its technical sophistication and practical benefits. The project demonstrates strong full-stack development capabilities, modern architecture decisions, and attention to user experience.

The comprehensive documentation and well-structured codebase show professional-grade software development practices, while the feature set addresses real-world communication needs with innovative solutions.
